alert.note: Alert for Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Kalamazoo. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 329 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kalamazoo, Portage, Eastwood, Vicksburg, Kalamazoo-Battle Creek International Airport, Westwood and Comstock. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
